item.title: [New Preprint] Intrinsic decoherence dynamics in the three-coupled harmonic oscillators interaction
item.description: Some time ago I put an idea on the decoherence drive on a coupled system of three interacting quantum harmonic oscillators, this works is in collaboration with Dr. Héctro M. Moya-Cessa. Now, we have submitted the full paper on the arXiv preprint server, and a mirror on ResearchGate. Intrinsic decoherence dynamics in the three-coupled harmonic oscillators interaction Alejandro R. Urzúa, Héctor M. Moya-Cessa [arXiv] [ResearchGate] Abstract: Applying the Milburn equation to describe intrinsic decoherence, we study the interaction of three-coupled quantum harmonic oscillators or quantized fields.
